name: 林鈞陶
objective:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解線性代數基本觀念以及矩陣特性。課程內容包含：(1) 線性聯立方程組 (2) 矩陣運算 (3) 行列式 (4) 向量空間 (5) 特徵值與特徵向量 (6) 正交投影與最小平方法 (7) 矩陣分解.
This course introduces the basic theory of digital signal processing and its application. The course outline includes: (1)Linear Equations (2) Matrix Algebra (3) Determinants (4)Vector Space (5) Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (6) Orthogonal Projections and Least Squared Solutions (7) Matrix Decompositions
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Linear Equations in Algebra.
Week 3: Linear Equations in Algebra. 
Week 4: Matrix Algebra.
Week 5: Matrix Algebra.
Week 6: Determinants.
Week 7: Determinants.
Week 8: Vector Space.
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: Vector Space.
Week 11: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors. 
Week 12: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors. 
Week 13: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors.
Week 14: Orthogonality and Least Squares.
Week 15: Orthogonality and Least Squares. 
Week 16: Symmetric Matrices and Quadratic Forms.
Week 17: Singular Value Decomposition.
Week 18: Final Exam.
課程進度視教學情況或假日會有更動
materials: Linear Algebra and Its Applications (by David. C. Lay 5th-Edition).
